description:
Serverless offers scalability, reliability, management simplicity, and no idle resource costs. But can you apply it to Machine Learning solutions?


Yes.


This talk will explore two approaches: using purpose-built AI services and building ML pipelines with custom models. We will discuss the pros and cons of each method and examine the unique challenges of integrating machine learning into a Serverless environment.


The solution examples we will discuss are based on real-life applications developed for major media companies and used by millions of users.
title: Serverless ❤️ Machine Learning
